ca_cert.description: The path to the Jenkins self-signed certificate.

password.description: Password to authenticate to Jenkins. User API Token can be used to replace user password.

server_url.description: The URL of the Jenkins server to connect to.

verify_ssl.description: Flag to turn off ssl verification

permissions.description: Global matrix permission set for the local user

username.description: Username of the Jenkins local user

description.description: Description of the Jenkins local user

email.description: Email address of the Jenkins local user

fullname.description: Full name of the Jenkins local user

password.description: Password of the jenkins local user

password_hash.description: Password hash of the jenkins local user
